rules_text:
Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters, if it wasn’t cast, put a +1/+1 counter on Wretched Skulker.
{3}{W}, Sacrifice Wretched Skulker: Exile target nonland permanent with mana value less than Wretched Skulker’s power.
